group_1.textLeft: Ughhh...

group_1.textRight: Is something the matter, Hime-chan?

group_1.textLeft: All I can do is hide out here in Takarazaki...@Sooo boring.

group_1.textRight: But Princess, aren't you the one who made this@decision...?
About faking your death and hiding away for a bit...

group_1.textLeft: Uhh, yeah, but still...
If I stay at home 'cause going out's no good,@it'd just be me and my mom.
But if I stay here where I'm hiding, I'm also just@totally holed up.
To be honest with you, this cutie's itching to at@least take a breather!★

group_1.textRight: You don't need a breather, though.
You already have no choice but to rest, since@there's nothing else to do in the first place.

group_1.textLeft: But it's suffocating 'cause I'm not free, y'know.
Cute lil' me gets seriously bored and lonely when@you guys are all away!
Man, I wish I'd get a chance to go somewhere@to have fun.

group_1.textRight: Miyu understands how you feel, buuut...
Aika-san, I think it'd be dangerous for you to go@outside...
It's Takarazaki here,
but we still might run into Magical Girls from@Kamihama...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...Oh!
If I can't go outside, then we'll just play indoors!

group_1.textRight: Indoors? You mean, here...?

group_1.textLeft: Nah. We're going to Sasha's home to play,@everybody!

group_1.textRight: How sudden...
And besides, isn't Sasha's place in Kamihama City?

group_1.textLeft: Well, I gotta be careful not to get spotted on@the way,
but there's nothing to worry about if we play@inside the house, yeah?

group_1.textRight: Even so, why Sasha's place?
Could it be that you remembered our promise,@Hime-chan...?

group_1.textLeft: Totally!
Ooh, you remembered it too, huh?
About that, about that!@What kind of promise was it?

group_1.textRight: We promised that we'd have a romance drama@viewing party at my place.
We haven't been able to make it happen, since@the timing hasn't been great,
but perhaps this is just the right time, don't@you think? *Giggle*♪

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Then it's settled!
Tomorrow, let's all go over to Sasha's place to@hang!

group_1.textRight: Ah, tomorrow...?@I'm not sure if I'll be able to clean up in time...
Indeed, this is very sudden.
Miyu and I have Youth Association activities to@attend to...

group_1.textLeft: That's right, that's right!
The Youth Association has lent us a place to hide@you...
We can't miss any of their activities!
The two of us also have Drama Club preparations@to do tomorrow...
The rehearsal of our joint performance with@another school is coming up,
so we can't really take a day off...

group_1.textRight: Me too... I've been called in to help out.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102801:effect_emotion_sad_0][se:7224_fall_into]Waaah, you're all gonna make me cry...
This cutie seriously wanted to hang with you guys@right away, y'know...

group_1.textRight: ...Hagumun.
Can we manage...?

group_1.textLeft: Hmmm... I understand how Aika-san feels, so...
It might be tough, but...let's talk to them and@see if we can work something out.
[chara:102801:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Wait, for realsies?!@You're cool with that?!

group_1.textRight: Yes.
I mean, I'm glad you said you wanted to have@fun with us...

group_1.textLeft: ...If Azumi and Miyabi say so...
Perhaps we should also try talking to the Youth@Association.

group_1.textRight: Right, right!

group_1.textLeft: Would you be alright with that, Sasha?

group_1.textRight: Yes, I'll just clear the flooring so no one trips@and falls down...!

group_1.textLeft: ...Could it be that Sasha is not good at cleaning...?
Thankies, everyone!★
This is the first time we're all gonna play together...@I'm like, so totally psyched!
